name: mapmap
description: A library for creating interactive maps.
author: Florian Ledermann

scripts.build: json2module package.json > build/package.js && node bin/rollup-node && node bin/rollup
scripts.browserify-production: browserify src/index.js --standalone mapmap --ignore d3-dsv | uglifyjs > build/mapmap.min.js
scripts.browserify: npm run browserify-dev && npm run browserify-production
scripts.version: npm run build && git add mapmap.js mapmap.min.js
